sentences.en: Could you give me a hand in adjusting the derrick?
sentences.cn: 你是否能帮我调整一下吊杆?

sentences.en: Derrick and I have been laying out the system of irrigating ditches.
sentences.cn: 德里克跟我在一起修建那个灌溉网.

sentences.en: Derrick: Yeah . He won't let us go out past our waists.
sentences.cn: 德瑞克: 就是嘛. 他不准我们游超过水深过腰的地方.

sentences.en: Do you give me a hand in adjusting the derrick?
sentences.cn: 你看是否能把我们的安排通知领班?

sentences.en: Do you want the derrick adjusted upwards and downwards?
sentences.cn: 你要将吊杆上调借是高调?

sentences.en: Don't stay under the arm of a derrick!
sentences.cn: 不要在起重机的吊臂下!

sentences.en: Hose - handing derrick are fitted port and starboard near the manifolds.
sentences.cn: 水管递井架是适合的口岸和右舷近的多头管.

sentences.en: Michelle searched Derrick's name online and found his blog.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔在网上搜索他的名字并且找到了他的博客.

sentences.en: Putting him on the current Bulls with my buddy Derrick Rose?
sentences.cn: 把与我的好友德里克罗斯目前公牛队 呢 ?

sentences.en: The hoisting capacity of that gin pole ( girder pole, guy derrick ) is sixty tons.
sentences.cn: 那个起重抱杆 ( 格状抱杆 、 转盘抱杆 ) 的起重能力为60吨.

sentences.en: The pylon cell units were hoisted to the deck by the transfer derrick.
sentences.cn: 塔室块件由传递用的转臂吊机吊放在桥面上.

sentences.en: The safety belt should be fastened when working on the derrick.
sentences.cn: 上井架工作必须系好安全带.

sentences.en: They were placed by a derrick mounted on rails on the bridge deck.
sentences.cn: 它们由轨道上的转臂吊机吊放在桥面上.

sentences.en: To raise or lower ( the boom of a crane or derrick ).
Unlike Harran Derrick, he seemed more of a character than a type.
sentences.cn: 他跟哈伦·台力克不一样,与其说他是个典型,还不如说他是个很特殊的人.

words.tran_cn: [机]起重机，转臂起重机；油井的铁架塔

trans.tran_en: a tall machine used for lifting heavy weights, especially on ships
